views module

musicband.views.about(request)[source]

Function loads ‘about’ html page from template folder.

musicband.views.detail(request, music_id)[source]
musicband.views.index(request)[source]

Function loads ‘home’ html page from template folder.

musicband.views.musicband(request)[source]

Function loads and return ‘home’ html page from template folder

musicband.views.records(request)[source]

Function loads ‘record’ html page from template folder, the page is populated with records from the database. Records are presented by date. “@login_required” Decorator for views (login_required function from user_auth app) checks that the user is logged in, redirecting to the log-in page if necessary.

return:

‘records’ html page with dictionary of records

musicband.views.vote(request, music_id)[source]
